data.name: DisconnectBusinessUnitError
data.value: Some employees of the business unit have accounts in Employee Self Service. Disable ESS for these employees before disabling it for the business unit.

data.name: SmsToOldPhoneText
data.value: The phone number is disconnected from Employee Self Service

data.name: SmsToNewPhoneText
data.value: The phone number is connected to Employee Self Service

data.name: SmsAfterCloseText
data.value: Your access to the Employee Self Service is suspended

data.name: SmsAfterTemporaryCloseText
data.value: Your access to the Employee Self Service is suspended.

data.name: ConnectEmployeeESSWarning
data.value: There are employees who are not connected to ESS and use notification settings of the business unit. Connect the employees to ESS to notify them of assignments via SMS or Viber, or configure other notification settings for them.

data.name: EmptyEmailExistsWarning
data.value: Some employees who use notification settings of the business unit do not have their email specified. Specify emails in employees' cards or configure other notification settings for them.

data.name: EmptyEmailPersonalExistsWarning
data.value: Some employees who use notification settings of the business unit do not have their personal email specified. Specify emails in employees' cards or configure other notification settings for them.

data.name: SmsAndViberNotifyEmployeesError
data.value: To notify employees of their assignments via SMS or Viber, connect the business unit to the Employee Self Service.
